name: Physics Kombat ll
description:
Learning science has never been so easy! Physics Kombat II - is a perfect blend of education & game, with a vast question bank covering over 300 concepts. It caters to CBSE curriculum of 9th class Physics. Detailed analysis of performance, voice guided crisp notes ensures conceptual clarity of kids. Play Physics Kombat II to clear your fundamental concepts.

Conquer the world with your skills! Get a chance to be a part of the Super Brain Club! Speed and accuracy will help you lead the game! The faster you workout, the more rewards, scholarship & money you earn. Liberty to learn concepts at your convenience! After playing this game, you will never go back to conventional online test. Learn Physics in a gamified way and also earn rewards for the same.

Topics
Motion
Forces and Laws of Motion
Gravitation
Work and Energy
Sound
Natural Resources

If you like this app, please rate us 5* & drop a review. Your comments help us to make our apps even better!

Additional

-Tracker to keep tab of your weak concepts & improve
-Play weekly tournaments & earn money
-Single player game with no number crunching required
